/usr/local/bin/c++ CMakeFiles/test_kafka.dir/main.cpp.o -o test_kafka   -L/home/github/wd/littletools/3rdparty/lib  -L/home/github/wd/littletools/3rdparty/lib/json  -L/home/github/wd/littletools/3rdparty/lib/rdkafka  -Wl,-rpath,/home/github/wd/littletools/3rdparty/lib:/home/github/wd/littletools/3rdparty/lib/json:/home/github/wd/littletools/3rdparty/lib/rdkafka:/home/github/wd/littletools/build/lib -lrdkafka++ ../lib/libuokafka.so -lpthread
